Definition at line 258 of file radiobutton_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Name = $Settings->get_setting( 'name' );
                        
                        $Value = $Settings->get_setting( 'value' );
                        
                        $Checked = $this->get_checked( $Settings );
                        
                        $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime() ) );

                        $Template = "<input id=\"$id\" style=\"cursor: pointer;\" ".
                                                      "type=\"radio\" value=\"$Value\" $Checked name=\"$Name\">";
                                                      
                        $Label = $Settings->get_setting( 'label' , '' );
                        
                        if( $Label != '' )
                        {
                              $Template .= "<label for=\"$id\" style=\"cursor: pointer;\">{lang:$Label}</label>";
                        }
                        
                        return( $Template );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

$  Cols,
$  Name,
$  CurrentValue

Function compiles radio buttons.

$Cols - Number of columns.

HTML code.

Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 103 of file radiobutton_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Counter = 0;
                        $Code  = '<table><tr>';
                        
                        foreach( $Records as $r )
                        {
                              if( $Counter == $Cols )
                              {
                                    $Counter = 0;
                                    $Code .= '</tr><tr>';
                              }
                              
                              $Code .= "<td>{radio:name=$Name;value=$r->value;current_value=".
                                    "$CurrentValue;label=$r->label}</td>";
                              
                              $Counter++;
                        }
                        
                        return( $Code .= '</tr></table>' );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 210 of file radiobutton_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Value = $Settings->get_setting( 'value' );
                        $Name = $Settings->get_setting( 'name' );
                        
                        if( $this->Security->get_gp( $Name ) )
                        {
                              $CurrentValue = $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'string' );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $CurrentValue = $Settings->get_setting( 'default' , $Value );
                        }

                        $Checked = $Value === $CurrentValue ? $Checked = 'checked' : '';
                        
                        return( $Checked );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'radio'.

Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.

Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 314 of file radiobutton_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'current_value' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'radio' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $Radio = $this->compile_readio( $this->BlockSettings );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{radio:$Parameters}" , $Radio , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 158 of file radiobutton_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'radioset' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              list( $Cols , $Name , $Query )= $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'cols,name,query' );

                              $CurrentValue = $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'command' , '' );
                              
                              $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
                              $Records = $this->Database->query( $Query );
                              $Records = $this->Database->fetch_results( $Records );
                              
                              $Code = $this->compile_readioset( $Records , $Cols , $Name , $CurrentValue );
                              $Str = str_replace( "{radioset:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
